text: Kiyoshi Ogawa ( Ogawa Kiyoshi, October 23, 1922 â€“ May 11, 1945) was a Japanese naval aviator ensign () of the Imperial Japanese Navy during World War II. As a kamikaze pilot, Ensign Ogawa's final action took place on May 11, 1945, during the Battle of Okinawa. ==References== None Category:1922 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Japanese military people Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:People from Gunma Prefecture Category:Suicide bombers
